option.value:
<resources> <!-- App name --> <string name="app_name">Water Spot</string>
<!-- Bottom Navigation Labels --> <string name="map_label">Explore</string> <string name="all_spots_label">All Spots</string> <string name="scoreboard_label">Ranking</string> <string name="profile_label">Profile</string>
<!-- FAB --> <string name="add_spot_fab_content_description">Add Spot</string>
<!-- Welcome Screen --> <string name="welcome_to">Welcome to</string> <string name="welcome_description">Discover free water sources around you. \n Get involved. Share. Refresh yourself.</string> <string name="login_button">Login</string> <string name="register_button">Register</string>
<!-- Login Screen --> <string name="login_title">Login</string> <string name="login_welcome">Welcome back!</string> <string name="login_welcome_description">Enter your credentials to continue</string> <string name="forgot_password">Forgot password?</string>
<!-- Register Screen --> <string name="register_title">Register</string> <string name="register_welcome">Create an account</string> <string name="register_welcome_description">Join us to discover and share water spots</string> <string name="add_photo">Add profile image</string> <string name="profile_photo_description">Profile photo</string> <string name="full_name_label">Full Name</string> <string name="phone_number_label">Phone Number</string>
<!-- Login/Register Common --> <string name="email_label">Email</string> <string name="email_icon_content_description">Email Icon</string> <string name="password_label">Password</string> <string name="password_icon_content_description">Password Icon</string> <string name="toggle_password_visibility">Tooggle Password Visibility</string>
<!-- Error Messages --> <string name="error_empty_email">Email field can\'t be empty</string> <string name="error_invalid_email">Invalid email address</string> <string name="error_empty_password">Password field can\'t be empty</string> <string name="error_short_password">Password must be at least 6 characters</string> <string name="error_weak_password">Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one digit</string> <string name="error_empty_full_name">Full Name field can\'t be empty</string> <string name="error_empty_phone_number">Phone Number field can\'t be empty</string> <string name="error_invalid_phone_number">Invalid phone number format</string> <string name="error_login_failed">Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.</string> <string name="error_register_failed">Registration failed. Please try again.</string>
<!-- Profile Screen --> <string name="account_overview">Account overview</string> <string name="edit_profile">Edit Profile</string> <string name="my_spots">My Water Spots</string> <string name="change_password">Change Password</string> <string name="change_language">Change Language</string> <string name="theme">Choose Theme</string> <string name="theme_light">Light</string> <string name="theme_dark">Dark</string> <string name="theme_system">System</string> <string name="settings">Settings</string> <string name="logout">Logout</string> <string name="location_tracking">Location Tracking</string> <string name="location_tracking_description">When service is enabled, you will be notified about nearby water spots or users.</string> <string name="nearby_radius_label">Nearby radius</string> <string name="nearby_radius_updated">Updated to %1$d meters.</string> <string name="nearby_radius_description">Larger radius may increase battery usage and deliver more notifications.</string>
<!-- Edit Profile Screen --> <string name="edit_profile_title">Edit Profile</string>
<!-- Change Password Screen --> <string name="change_password_title">Change Password</string> <string name="current_password_label">Current password</string> <string name="new_password_label">New password</string> <string name="confirm_new_password_label">Confirm new password</string> <string name="edit_profile_header_icon_cd">Edit profile illustration</string>
<!-- Public Profile Screen --> <string name="public_profile_title">Public Profile</string> <string name="public_profile_spots_title">Water spots</string> <string name="public_profile_no_spots">No spots added yet.</string> <string name="public_profile_empty_state">No profile data.</string>
<!-- Google Maps Screen --> <string name="permission_denied_message">"Location permission is required.\nPlease enable it in settings."</string>
<!-- Filters --> <string name="filter_title">Filters</string> <string name="filter_radius_label">Radius:</string> <string name="cancel_button">Cancel</string> <string name="apply_button">Apply</string>
<!-- Add Spot Screen (step 1) --> <string name="add_spot_title">Add Spot: Location</string> <string name="add_spot_instructions">Move the marker to\nthe precise location</string> <string name="add_spot_confirmation">Confirm Location</string> <string name="add_spot_location_error">Please Move Closer</string>
<!-- Add Spot Photo Screen (step 2) --> <string name="add_spot_photo_title">Add Spot: Photo</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_instructions">Take a photo of water source \nor select one from your gallery.</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_placeholder">Click to add</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_confirmation">Use Photo</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_dialog_title">Add Photo</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_dialog_message">Please select a photo from your gallery or take a new one.</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_gallery_button">Gallery</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_camera_button">Camera</string>
<!-- Add Spot Details Screen (step 3) --> <string name="add_spot_details_title">Add Spot: Details</string> <string name="add_spot_details_instructions">Provide details about\nthe water source.</string> <string name="add_spot_details_confirmation">Submit</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_label">Water Source Type</string> <string name="add_spot_details_cleanliness_label">Cleanliness</string> <string name="add_spot_details_description_label">Description (optional)</string> <string name="add_spot_details_description_placeholder">Describe water source…</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_public">Public Tap</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_fountain">Fountain</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_well">Well</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_refill_station">Refill station</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_spring">Spring</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_other">Other</string> <string name="add_spot_details_cleanliness_clean">Clean</string> <string name="add_spot_details_cleanliness_moderate">Moderate</string> <string name="add_spot_details_cleanliness_dirty">Dirty</string> <string name="add_spot_failed">Failed to add spot. Please try again later.</string>
<!-- Spot Details Bottom Sheet Modal --> <string name="spot_details_description_label">Description</string> <string name="spot_details_posted_by">Posted by</string> <string name="spot_details_review_button">Review</string> <string name="spot_details_navigate_button">Navigate</string> <string name="spot_details_add_photo_button">Add photo</string> <string name="show_less">Show less</string> <string name="read_more">Read more</string> <string name="spot_details_no_reviews">No reviews yet.</string>
<!-- Spot Details Bottom Sheet Modal - Review Dialog --> <string name="review_dialog_title">Review Spot</string> <string name="review_dialog_move_closer">Move closer to review (distance:</string> <string name="review_dialog_rating_label">Rate this spot</string> <string name="review_dialog_comment_label">Your review</string> <string name="review_dialog_comment_placeholder">Share your thoughts about this spot…</string> <string name="review_dialog_submit_button">Submit Review</string> <string name="review_dialog_success_message">Review submitted successfully!</string> <string name="review_dialog_error_message">Failed to submit review. Please try again later.</string>
<!-- All Spots Screen --> <string name="all_spots_empty_message">No water spots found.</string>
<!-- Ranks --> <string name="rank_explorer">Explorer</string> <string name="rank_contributor">Contributor</string> <string name="rank_scout">Scout</string> <string name="rank_guide">Guide</string> <string name="rank_water_guardian">Water Guardian</string>
<string name="location_permission_error">Location permission error</string>
<string name="back_button_content_description">Back</string> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent

<resources> <!-- App name --> <string name="app_name">Water Spot</string>
<!-- Bottom Navigation Labels --> <string name="map_label">Explore</string> <string name="all_spots_label">All Spots</string> <string name="scoreboard_label">Ranking</string> <string name="profile_label">Profile</string>
<!-- FAB --> <string name="add_spot_fab_content_description">Add Spot</string>
<!-- Welcome Screen --> <string name="welcome_to">Welcome to</string> <string name="welcome_description">Discover free water sources around you. \n Get involved. Share. Refresh yourself.</string> <string name="login_button">Login</string> <string name="register_button">Register</string>
<!-- Login Screen --> <string name="login_title">Login</string> <string name="login_welcome">Welcome back!</string> <string name="login_welcome_description">Enter your credentials to continue</string> <string name="forgot_password">Forgot password?</string>
<!-- Register Screen --> <string name="register_title">Register</string> <string name="register_welcome">Create an account</string> <string name="register_welcome_description">Join us to discover and share water spots</string> <string name="add_photo">Add profile image</string> <string name="profile_photo_description">Profile photo</string> <string name="full_name_label">Full Name</string> <string name="phone_number_label">Phone Number</string>

Please check your credentials and try again.</string> <string name="error_register_failed">Registration failed. Please try again.</string>
<!-- Profile Screen --> <string name="account_overview">Account overview</string> <string name="edit_profile">Edit Profile</string> <string name="my_spots">My Water Spots</string> <string name="change_password">Change Password</string> <string name="change_language">Change Language</string> <string name="theme">Choose Theme</string> <string name="theme_light">Light</string> <string name="theme_dark">Dark</string> <string name="theme_system">System</string> <string name="settings">Settings</string> <string name="logout">Logout</string> <string name="location_tracking">Location Tracking</string> <string name="location_tracking_description">When service is enabled, you will be notified about nearby water spots or users.</string> <string name="nearby_radius_label">Nearby radius</string> <string name="nearby_radius_updated">Updated to %1$d meters.</string> <string name="nearby_radius_description">Larger radius may increase battery usage and deliver more notifications.</string>
<!-- Edit Profile Screen --> <string name="edit_profile_title">Edit Profile</string> <string name="save">Save</string>
<!-- Change Password Screen --> <string name="change_password_title">Change Password</string> <string name="current_password_label">Current password</string> <string name="new_password_label">New password</string> <string name="confirm_new_password_label">Confirm new password</string> <string name="edit_profile_header_icon_cd">Edit profile illustration</string>
<!-- Public Profile Screen --> <string name="public_profile_title">Public Profile</string> <string name="public_profile_spots_title">Water spots</string> <string name="public_profile_no_spots">No spots added yet.</string> <string name="public_profile_empty_state">No profile data.</string>
<!-- Google Maps Screen --> <string name="permission_denied_message">"Location permission is required.\nPlease enable it in settings."</string>
<!-- Filters --> <string name="filter_title">Filters</string> <string name="filter_radius_label">Radius:</string> <string name="cancel_button">Cancel</string> <string name="apply_button">Apply</string>
<!-- Add Spot Screen (step 1) --> <string name="add_spot_title">Add Spot: Location</string> <string name="add_spot_instructions">Move the marker to\nthe precise location</string> <string name="add_spot_confirmation">Confirm Location</string> <string name="add_spot_location_error">Please Move Closer</string>
<!-- Add Spot Photo Screen (step 2) --> <string name="add_spot_photo_title">Add Spot: Photo</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_instructions">Take a photo of water source \nor select one from your gallery.</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_placeholder">Click to add</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_confirmation">Use Photo</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_dialog_title">Add Photo</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_dialog_message">Please select a photo from your gallery or take a new one.</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_gallery_button">Gallery</string> <string name="add_spot_photo_camera_button">Camera</string>
<!-- Add Spot Details Screen (step 3) --> <string name="add_spot_details_title">Add Spot: Details</string> <string name="add_spot_details_instructions">Provide details about\nthe water source.</string> <string name="add_spot_details_confirmation">Submit</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_label">Water Source Type</string> <string name="add_spot_details_cleanliness_label">Cleanliness</string> <string name="add_spot_details_description_label">Description (optional)</string> <string name="add_spot_details_description_placeholder">Describe water source…</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_public">Public Tap</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_fountain">Fountain</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_well">Well</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_refill_station">Refill station</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_spring">Spring</string> <string name="add_spot_details_type_other">Other</string> <string name="add_spot_details_cleanliness_clean">Clean</string> <string name="add_spot_details_cleanliness_moderate">Moderate</string> <string name="add_spot_details_cleanliness_dirty">Dirty</string> <string name="add_spot_failed">Failed to add spot. Please try again later.</string>
<!-- Spot Details Bottom Sheet Modal --> <string name="spot_details_description_label">Description</string> <string name="spot_details_posted_by">Posted by</string> <string name="spot_details_review_button">Review</string> <string name="spot_details_navigate_button">Navigate</string> <string name="spot_details_add_photo_button">Add photo</string> <string name="show_less">Show less</string> <string name="read_more">Read more</string> <string name="spot_details_no_reviews">No reviews yet.</string>
<!-- Spot Details Bottom Sheet Modal - Review Dialog --> <string name="review_dialog_title">Review Spot</string> <string name="review_dialog_move_closer">Move closer to review (distance:</string> <string name="review_dialog_rating_label">Rate this spot</string> <string name="review_dialog_comment_label">Your review</string> <string name="review_dialog_comment_placeholder">Share your thoughts about this spot…</string> <string name="review_dialog_submit_button">Submit Review</string> <string name="review_dialog_success_message">Review submitted successfully!</string> <string name="review_dialog_error_message">Failed to submit review. Please try again later.</string>
<!-- All Spots Screen --> <string name="all_spots_empty_message">No water spots found.</string>
<!-- Ranks --> <string name="rank_explorer">Explorer</string> <string name="rank_contributor">Contributor</string> <string name="rank_scout">Scout</string> <string name="rank_guide">Guide</string> <string name="rank_water_guardian">Water Guardian</string>
